body:
Angelo,

Windows for EnergyPlus need to be assigned as sub-surfaces of a base surface, which I see that you are doing in you GH file.  However, the sub surface must not go all of the way to the edges of the base surface (it must be smaller than the base surface).  If you just scale your window geometries around their center points by a little bit before you add it with the addHBGlz, everything should work fine.

-Chris
